title: Up the organisation (TEFC)
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and Peter Riding
brief_description: Robert Townsend has unconventional views on how business should be run. he gives his views on such topics as the Chief Executive, the Personnel Department, Computers Management, Consultants, the Public Relations Department, the Board of Directors, Getting In and Getting On and People.
